alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Haywood; Lauderdale; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:39AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Crockett, southeastern Dyer, western Gibson, northeastern Lauderdale, northern Haywood and northwestern Madison Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 939 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chestnut Bluff, or 12 miles northeast of Ripley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Alamo, Bells, Halls, Nutbush, Forked Deer, Chestnut Bluff, Belle Eagle, Adair, Eaton, Maury City, Friendship, Gates, Gadsden, Yorkville, Gibson Wells, Fowlkes, Lapata and Bonicord. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Haywood; Lauderdale; Madison
